text: Dark Tranquillity is a Swedish melodic death metal band from Billdal. The band was formed in 1989 by band member Mikael Stanne and guitarist Niklas Sundin. Stanne and Sundin originally formed a band under the name Septic Broiler. Members Anders Fridén, Anders Jivarp and Martin Henriksson joined the band shortly after. Dark Tranquillity is an important part of the melodic death metal genre of music and are one of the longest-standing bands from the original Gothenburg metal scene. They released their debut album, Skydancer, on August 30, 1993. They are currently signed to Century Media Records. ==Band members== ;Current *Mikael Stanne - vocals (1989–present) *Martin Henriksson - guitar (1989–present) *Niklas Sundin - guitar (1989–present) *Daniel Antonsson - bass (2008–present) *Anders Jivarp - drums (1989–present) *Martin Brändström - programming, keyboards (1999-present) ;Former *Anders Fridén - vocals (1989–1993) *Fredrik Johansson - guitar (1993–1998) *Mikael Niklasson - bass (1999−2008) ==Discography== ===Albums=== *Skydancer (1993) *The Gallery (1995) *The Mind's I (1997) *Projector (1999) *Haven (2000) *Damage Done (2002) *Character (2005) *Fiction (2007) *We Are the Void (2010) *Construct (2013) ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1980s music groups Category:Musical groups established in 1989 Category:1990s music groups Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:Melodic death metal bands Category:Swedish heavy metal bands Category:Musical groups from Gothenburg
title: Dark Tranquillity
